### Chart A

```{r}
BC_data <- mapcan::census_pop2016 %>% 
  select(population_2016,
         pr_english,
         population_density_2016,
         born_outside_canada,
         census_division_name) %>% 
  filter(pr_english == "British Columbia")
  
map_pop <- BC_data %>%   
  mapcan(boundaries = census,
          type = standard,
          province = BC) %>%
  ggplot(aes(x = long, y = lat, group = group, fill = census_division_name)) +
  geom_polygon() +
  coord_fixed() +
  theme_mapcan()
map_pop

```
